unnormalised: **Mhojem Cholleak Aapan Vaidkiacho Intern Mhunn Dista (ani Her Ballaanchea Dukhmichea Vixeanv)**
normalised: **Mhozo toddler apleak medical intern somzota (ani her bhurgeanchi addventuram)**

unnormalised: Dekhun, cholyanche jinn. Tem muleant ek lahan, magpi CEO sovem jieunchea bhaxen asa, zo chodd korun kuddkeanim ani chiktt-chiktt hathachea chhapanim uloita. Punn kallacher, mhojea lahan Rohan-an vostu ekdam novea stharaar vheleat. Tannem tharailam ki to Dr. Rohan asa, dista. Tannem aplem stethoscope-ui ghetlam - ek toilette kagdachea rollache punarvichar - ani to aplea divos Mittens mhunnchea durbolll bhilleak "chodd purr" asa mhunn sangoon sarta.
normalised: Dekhun, eka toddleran jivit. Tem aslem mhunntlear eka lhan, demand korpi C-E-O kodden jiyevpachem zannvayeta, zo chodd korun gruntamni ani chilkhat hatachechhaapeamni uktaay korta. Punn halinch, mhojea lhan Rohan-an vostunchi ekdom navi stage ghetlea. Tannem tharailem ki to Doctor Rohan mhunn halincho, disot asa. Tachekodden stethoscope-ui asa – eka toilet paper rollachem punarvapri rup – ani to aplo dis amchea gorib pussy Mittens-ak "chodd fur" asa mhunn diagnnose korun kaddta.

unnormalised: Hem sogllem pattlea satolleant suru zalem jeun Rohan-ak 102°F (tumchea metric lokanchi zonn 38.9°C) fever aili. Apollo Children's Hospital-achea xevattea clinic-ant Dr. Patel-anchea xevatteachea clinic-ak vochpache bhaxen Calpol ani borea mogancho ek ghot allo. Punn Rohan, sadach inquisitive choll, Dr. Patel-achea stethoscope-an ani sogllem "examination" prakriyeant bore-bhes thallo. Atam, tannem svatha apnnaun gheunchem mhunn tharailam.
normalised: Hem sogllem poilea satolleant suru zalem jea vellar Rohan-ak ek xem ani don degree Fahrenheit-cho tap yetalo (tumchea metric lokam khatir sumar ttees point nau degree Celsius). Apollo Children's Hospital-ant aslolea sthanik clinic-ant Doctor Patel-ak bhet dilean Calpol-achem prescription ani bhov cuddles mell'lle. Pun Rohan, ekdom inquisitive lhan jiv, Doctor Patel-achea stethoscope ani sogllea "examination" process-ant fasinatt zaalo. Halin, tannem aapnnach provok korunk tharailem.

unnormalised: Mittens-ak, somzon ghetleat, tanka khuxal na. Tika Rohan-an ek plastic ચમચो gheun thoka korun ani ti "sogllea bhaxen borea" mhunn sangoon anek "check-ups" ditleat, zaka ti thoka korun ani ti ek mogachi pat-bhaxen ditleat. Mhanem teka eka divos tachea khilonnea ruler-an tichem tapmaan mapcheak probhayt korunk dhorlo. "3000 degrees!" tannem anandaan jaher kelem. Spashtopanen, amkam tanchi unit conversions-achi goroz asa.
normalised: Mittens, somzunk zata, khuxal na. Tika Rohan-an plastic spoon-an boddemarun ani "soglle borem" asa mhunn generous pat marun "check-up" korunk laita, tem assault-achem border lagta. Hanvem tannem kal Mittens-achem temperature tachea toy ruler-an mezunk sodun dhorlem. "teen hazar degree!" tannem khuxalkayen uktailem. Punn disot asa, amkam tachea unit conversions-ancher kam korunk zai.

unnormalised: Khore karak? Tannem "vokhadd" sangcheak suru kelem - zachem sogllem kuttailele biscuit ani udok asa. Mhojea ghorkariak, tachi dovut bhog, fakt ek sip ghetlo. Tannem sanglem tem "interesting" dista mhunn. Mhaka dista tannem fokot ek cholleachem dukhi moddunchem mhunn zata. Mhanem tench lain dhorlem jeun Rohan-an vochpachea padrixechea kukureak aplem "vokhadd" divcheak probhayt kelem.
normalised: Khore kicker? Tannem “medicine” prescribe korunk suru korlam – jem fokot crushed biscuits ani udkachem asa. Mhojea ghovak, bhogum taka, tannem ek ghoont ghetli. Tannem sanglam ki taka "interesting" lagli mhunn. Mhaka dista taka ek toddler meltdown tallunk zai aslem. Hanvem ek line kaddli jea vellar Rohan-an tachem "medicine" padosachea dog-ak divunk sodlem.

unnormalised: Ani proxna? Oh, te proxna. "Mommy, Mittensachem nak kityak thondd asa?" "Daddy, kityak doctor dhovo coat ghalta?" "Tumchea pottant kitem asa?" (Tench mellyn mhakan vinenticho jaap divcheak nakarlo.) Tem ek lahan vaidki school professor bhaxen jieunchea bhaxen asa, zo curiosity-ant majoring asa ani chaos-ant minoring asa.
normalised: Ani prashn! Oh, prashn. "Mommy, Mittens-achem naak thondd kiteak asa?" "Daddy, doctor kiteak dhovo coat ghalta?" "Tumchea potant kitem asa?" (Tem last mhaka politely javab divonk nako aslem.) Tem eka miniature medical school professor kodden jiyevpachem zannvayeta zo curiosity-an majoring korta ani chaos-an minoring korta.

unnormalised: Haso ailear vost, ti thodi sundar asa. To sodankall zata ani utsah aslo asa. To sadachea bhaxen madad korcheak dukhaila, jeun tachea pod'dhati thode... unconventional aslyari. Kiteak mhunn ami fuddaracho pediatrician amchea hatak ghevchi asa. Yaa kiteak to ek khorea borea biscuit-udok mixer asto. Vella sangto.
normalised: Funny vochon, tem thodde torean adorable asa. To ekdom earnest ani enthusiastic asa. Taka genuinely help korunk zai, kiteak tannachi paddhati thodde… unconventional asat. Kiteak amkam ek future pediatrician mellunk xakta. Vo kiteak to khorench borean biscuit-water mixer zata. Time sangtalem.

unnormalised: Hanv ek lahan first-aid kit-ant invest korcheak dukhaila, fokot tachea "practice"-ank. Kiteak mhunn thodde band-aids ani thodde antiseptic wipes. Ani chodd korun biscuit tin-ak ek lock. Bhillek mhaka te dukhi dolle divcheak dukhaita. Mhaka dista ti suttkachek yojan korti asa. Dukhi Mittens, tichi khorea vaidki dukhichi goroz astaa sarki, punn aaxea korum na Dr. Rohan-achea hataan.
normalised: Hanv eka lhan first-aid kit-ant invest korpacho vichar kortam, fokot tachea "practice"-a khatir. Kiteak band-aids ani antiseptic wipes. Ani definitely biscuit tin khatir ek lock. Pussy mhaka pleading dolle dita. Mhaka dista tika aapli escape plott korunk asa. Gorib Mittens, tika halinchea disa medical attention-achi goroz asa, punn hopefully Doctor Rohan-achea hatant na.

unnormalised: Dekhun, jeun tumhi eka lahan bhurgeank toiletta kagdachea rollachea stethoscope-an ani suspiciously dampa plastika ચમચो gheun bhonvddi marunk distat, tem probhayt Rohan asa. Ani jeun to tumkam kuttailele biscuit "vokhadd" dita, probhayt fokot borea dolleani hasun pachhe kaddat. Tumchem pachan tumkam dhanyvad ditolem. Ani Mittens-ank mhanem sori mhunn sanga. Tinnem hea satolleak kaim extra treats zoddleat.
normalised: Dekhun, tum eka lhan bhurgeak toilet paper roll stethoscope ani suspiciously damp plastic spoon gheun yetalona disota zalear, tem Rohan zatolem. Ani tannem tumkam crushed biscuit "medicine" offer kelea zalear, fokot smile politely korat ani slowlean fattim sortat. Tumchem digestive system tumkam thank you kortalem.
